Reviews.Title: Matsunichi M97
Reviews.Author: gerald meyer
Reviews.Content: This unit is sturdy,easy to use and quick to react to input. It is the best tablet I have used.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: peaches 33
Reviews.Content: I luv it !!! Great sounds and picture best I've bought so far.�Perfect for everyday use thank you. Looking to purchase one for myHusband

Reviews.Title: my first one , didn't know what to expect .
Reviews.Author: William D. Banks
Reviews.Content: I'm learning the ins & outs of it . So far I haven't had any problems , well one , it'll shut down on occasion & I have to start it up again . It's no big deal just a little annoying . I have no real complaints with it .

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price, great value
Reviews.Author: Carol Marinelli
Reviews.Content: Matsuichi DigitalIt is all that the ad said it was and more. I would recomend this tablet for everyone

Reviews.Title: Matsunichi Digital Usa 9.7 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Vazquez "griselas"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is called  Matsunichi M97 it is so beautiful is Hd and the videos are clear and shiny. Plays the games without a problem.It is a shame they discontinued this product, and replaced it with a less storage, lower memory version which is the Matsunichi Marquis. I read all the specifications before buying, and for about the same price this is a much better bargani.The sound is very loud like the Galaxy Tab1 that we have. It goes at lightning speed to the internet, I saw some of the games download in minutes. There is an Open Office free app that can be installed. I don't use that, but it will work. The camera is the usual  cheap kind it has only one. Still for me works perfectly fast to the net , emails, plays music it has 8 gb storage which is acceptable.The only con I seen is that it doesn't have an icon to lower the volume on the screen. The thing that I like the most besides it performance is how sturdy it is it has metal on the sides and on the back is a tought plactic it is quite heavy I like that. I will be always very greatful that I can find  items that I need or want at an affordable price even if it breaks tomorrow, (which I expect it will never happen) I still be happy and it will just send it to repair it looks like an Ipad and for my needs it works like one.  Bottom line is a great product a very good tablet.
